```{r}
library(TSA)
```

```{r}
setwd("C:/")

child_RSA_wtcs <- readRDS("child_RSA_wtcs.rds")
child_IBI_wtcs <- readRDS("child_IBI_wtcs.rds")

```

```{r}
setwd("C:/Users/grace/Desktop/Desktop/Research/FIP/special issue/RSA_child_wavelets_no_lag")
wavelets = names(child_RSA_wtcs)
for (i in wavelets){
  filename = paste0("wavelet_", i, ".png")
  png(filename)
  my.w <- child_RSA_wtcs[[i]]
  plot.biwavelet(my.w, plot.phase = T)
  dev.off()
}
```
